item.title: MedBioRAG: Semantic Search and Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Large Language Models for Medical and Biological QA
item.description: arXiv:2512.10996v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Recent advancements in retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) have significantly enhanced the ability of large language models (LLMs) to perform complex question-answering (QA) tasks. item.title: KBQA-R1: Reinforcing Large Language Models for Knowledge Base Question Answering
item.description: arXiv:2512.10999v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Knowledge Base Question Answering (KBQA) challenges models to bridge the gap between natural language and strict knowledge graph schemas by generating executable logical forms. While Large Language Models (LLMs) have advanced this field, current appro...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> knowledge base, vision, RAG, model, experiment | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: Deep Learning--Accelerated Multi-Start Large Neighborhood Search for Real-time Freight Bundling
item.description: arXiv:2512.11187v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Online Freight Exchange Systems (OFEX) play a crucial role in modern freight logistics by facilitating real-time matching between shippers and carrier. However, efficient combinatorial bundling of transporation jobs remains a bottleneck. We model the ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> platform, RAG, model, transformer, arxiv | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: Clip-and-Verify: Linear Constraint-Driven Domain Clipping for Accelerating Neural Network Verification
item.description: arXiv:2512.11087v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: State-of-the-art neural network (NN) verifiers demonstrate that applying the branch-and-bound (BaB) procedure with fast bounding techniques plays a key role in tackling many challenging verification properties. item.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.
item.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> retrieval, knowledge base, RAG, model, LLM | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
